text: Anaparthy Mandal is one of the 64 mandals in East Godavari District of Andhra Pradesh. As per census 2011, there are 9 villages. == Demographics == Anaparthy Mandal has total population of 70,859 as per the Census 2011 out of which 35,395 are males while 35,464 are females and the average Sex Ratio of Anaparthy Mandal is 1,002. The total literacy rate of Anaparthy Mandal is 72.37%. The male literacy rate is 69.02% and the female literacy rate is 62.3%. == Towns & Villages == === Villages === #Anaparthy #Duppalapudi #Koppavaram #Kutukuluru #Mahendrawada #Pedaparthi #Polamuru #Pulagurtha #Ramavaram == See also == *List of mandals in Andhra Pradesh == References == Category:Mandals in East Godavari district Category:Mandals in Andhra Pradesh
title: Anaparthy mandal
